Claim: "9 million people died prematurely from pollution-related diseases in 2015"
Referring expressions: 9 million people, pollution-related diseases, 2015  Pollution, all deaths worldwide
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsDiedPrematurely(a) and (IsFromPollution(b) and IsIn2015(c))))) & (forall g (forall f (  IsFromPollution(f) ->  IsCausedBy(g)))) & (forall h (forall i ( IsCausedBy(h) ->   IsFromPollution(i))))) -> (exists d (exists e (IsCausedBy(d) and IsAllDeaths(e))))
